All statistics are according to the ATP World Tour and ITF website. Throughout his career, Kuerten won a total of 28 ATP titles — 20 in singles, including 3 Grand Slam titles, 5 ATP Masters Series tournaments and a Tennis Masters Cup, as well as 8 in doubles. == Significant finals == === Grand Slam tournaments === ==== Singles: 3 (3 titles) ==== {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size:96%" !
